desc: Water Resistant Jewelry brand for the woman who wants to feel stylish, confidence and powerful. Our mission is to provide Wallet-friendly high quality products. Take a pic of your look with our Hello Luxy Collections and tag a photo on Instagram with #HelloLuxyBabes for a chance to be featured in our gallery.

layout.text: 25% OFF on orders over $40 with the code: SUMMER25.
Your Jewelry can tell your story without speaking!
